Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies are back home for a seven-game homestand at Citizens Bank Park, starting with a series against the Houston Astros, August 26-28.
The series will feature Star Wars Night, Goya Latino Family Celebration, Independence Blue Cross Senior Stroll the Bases, and the final Citizens Businessperson's Special of the regular season.
Ceremonial first pitches will be thrown by USA Baseball Women's National Team player Denae Benites, former NFL player Carl Nassib, and former 76ers player and head coach Doug Collins.
The Phillies RBI All-Star Teams will be recognized and there will be an on-field performance by Dogs in a Pile!
For this series only, La Vera will be offering its Famous Roast Pork Sandwich at Coca-Cola Corner (left field).
Others: The games will be broadcast on NBCSP, nbcsportsphiladelphia.com, and the NBC Sports App, as well as on 94 WIP and WTTM 1680. Tuesday's game will also be broadcast on TBS, out-of-market only, and Wednesday's game will be broadcast on MLB Network, out-of-market only.
